title: Charles Whitman ////// 229
description:
Charles Whitman ////// 229

Part 1 of 1

www.TrueCrimeGarage.com

In 1966 a former U.S. Marine took rifles and climbed atop the main building tower at the University of Texas and opened fire on the people below. This induced over 90 minutes of pure run for your life panic. Tonight on a very special episode of TCG the Captain has a Guinness and hangs out with Justin from the Generation Why podcast to discuss one of the deadliest mass shootings in U.S. history.

Check out Nic and Arron's Episode @ www.thegenerationwhypodcast.com

Beer Fund: https://truecrimegarage.com/home
author: truecrimegarage@gmail.com (TRUE CRIME GARAGE)
